name: FlexNet Code Insight Scan
description: Scan for OSS components, licenses, and security vulnerabilities using FlexNet Code Inisght.
author: Flexera

inputs.name: URL
inputs.label: FlexNet Code Insight Server
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the server URL in the format â€“ http or https://<Server_Host>:<Port>/. Ensure that the URL is publicly accessible and that the port is opened up.

inputs.name: Token
inputs.label: Authentication Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter user access token for FlexNet Code Insight. This can be obtained/generated from the 'Preferences' page in FlexNet Code Insight server.

inputs.name: ProjectName
inputs.label: FlexNet Code Insight Project Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the project name where the inventory is to be stored. Project should be of type 'Inventory only'

inputs.name: ScanFolders
inputs.label: Folder(s) to Scan
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter a comma separated list of paths of folders to scan.

messages.DownloadFromAzureBlobStorage: Downloading artifacts from Azure blob storage, Container Name: %s
messages.StorageAccountDoesNotExist: Failed to get azure storage account with name %s.
messages.ExtractFileFailedMsg:
Extraction failed for file: %s 
code: %d 
stdout: %s 
stderr: %s 
error: %s;
messages.ExtractNonExistFile: Extraction failed for file: %s because it does not exist.
messages.ExtractDirFailed: Extraction failed for file: %s because it is a directory.
messages.ExtractFailedCannotCreate: Extraction failed for file: %s because temporary location could not be created: %s
messages.RetrievingJdkFromAzure: Retrieving the JDK from Azure blob storage.
messages.RetrievingJdkFromLocalPath: Retrieving the JDK from local path.
messages.UnsupportedFileExtension: Specified JDK source file does not have a supported file extension.
messages.CouldNotFetchAccessTokenforAzureStatusCo: Could not fetch access token for Azure. Status code: %s, status message: %s
messages.CouldNotFetchAccessTokenforMSIDueToMSINo: Could not fetch access token for Managed Service Principal. Please configure Managed Service Identity (MSI) for virtual machine 'https://aka.ms/azure-msi-docs'. Status code: %s, status message: %s
messages.CouldNotFetchAccessTokenforMSIStatusCode: Could not fetch access token for Managed Service Principal. Status code: %s, status message: %s
